1.17.1.1.0.0:
- Mod moved to Forge 1.17.1
- New texture of the water flow projectile
- Now water drops only have an effect while they are in the player's hand
- Added new magical boxes
- Added a separate tab for magic boxes
- Added elements of 8 elements from group A
- New tab icon with magic stones
- An empty stone has been added, it can be crafted using glass and 4 Nether stars
- Added the mod logo
- Added a mod update script
- Added some things for future mod updates
- [Bugfix] It is no longer possible to use multiple stones at the same time
- [Bugfix] Now, after death, the stone returns
- [Bugfix] Fixed wooden box hitbox
- [Bugfix] Fixed dup of shields
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where the shield could be used several times when it was in the spare hand
- [Bugfix] Fixed a bug where a player could use a shield and after the end of the wizard effect, the shield could return
You can download the mod by following the link: https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/keepers-of-the-stones

- Added new element spells: rain bow, magma shield, Tornado battle axe, crystal dagger, lava hammer, water katana, fire sword, air rapier
